meanings.sent1: I enjoy a cup of java in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The cafe serves delicious java to its customers.
meanings.sent3: The java was so strong, it woke up the whole neighborhood!
meanings.sent4: Her love for java was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly brewed java filled the room.

meanings.sent1: She learned to code in java at school.
meanings.sent2: Many developers use java for software development.
meanings.sent3: The computer spoke only in java, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: In the world of programming, java is a powerful tool.
meanings.sent5: His passion for java programming was evident in his work.

meanings.sent1: The java plant requires specific growing conditions.
meanings.sent2: Farmers cultivate java for its beans.
meanings.sent3: The java plant in the garden attracted many bees.
meanings.sent4: The java plant stood tall among the other crops.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the java plant rustled in the breeze.

meanings.sent1: The java beans are known for their rich flavor.
meanings.sent2: The barista used java beans to make the espresso.
meanings.sent3: The java beans danced in the grinder before brewing.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly ground java beans filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The java beans from that region are highly sought after.
